version_description:
- Updated to work with all HHAeXchange system versions

- Minor Technical Updates

- Performance Enhancements

- Updated to work with all HHAeXchange system versions

- Minor Technical Updates

- Performance Enhancements

- Ability to restrict access to the Mobile Application by Caregiver Device

- Support Care path and Observations

- Display Multiple Patient Addresses in Visit Details

- Updated Logo and Color Scheme

- Support Care path and Observations

- Display Multiple Patient Addresses in Visit Details

- Updated Logo and Color Scheme

-- Support for Signature with Skip Reason and optional Timesheet for CDPAP Cases

-- Removed capability to Clock-IN/OUT without location services enabled

-- Tightened security around the GPS EVV method

-- Corrected messaging for visits with mutual patients to inform the Caregiver to enter information

-- Removed static phone number descriptions in Patient Details

-- Update to Legal Documents

-- Support for Signature with Skip Reason and optional Timesheet for CDPAP Cases

-- Removed capability to Clock-IN/OUT without location services enabled

-- Tightened security around the GPS EVV method

-- Corrected messaging for visits with mutual patients to inform the Caregiver to enter information

-- Removed static phone number descriptions in Patient Details

-- Update to Legal Documents

The Agency can configure Consecutive Shift Support that will only require the Caregiver to Clock In and Clock Out once for consecutive shifts for a single patient, and if applicable, consecutive shifts for 2 Linked Internal Patients.  The Care Path and Visit Detail screens will be displayed per shift at Clock Out.

The Agency can configure Consecutive Shift Support that will only require the Caregiver to Clock In and Clock Out once for consecutive shifts for a single patient, and if applicable, consecutive shifts for 2 Linked Internal Patients.  The Care Path and Visit Detail screens will be displayed per shift at Clock Out.
Addressed an issue with Clock Out when refusing duties in the POC.
Addressed an issue with Clock Out when refusing duties in the POC.
The Patient Info screen now displays the phone descriptions set by the Agency for phone numbers other than the primary.  This information appears in parens next to each phone number.
The Patient Info screen now displays the phone descriptions set by the Agency for phone numbers other than the primary.  This information appears in parens next to each phone number.
Addressed several security issues.
Addressed several security issues.

1) Signature File upload available storage validation;
2) Permit Consecutive Shifts in Visits and Patients tab;
3) Addressed several maintenance issues;
4) Switched to Google's Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) after deprecation of GCM

1) Signature File upload available storage validation;
2) Permit Consecutive Shifts in Visits and Patients tab;
3) Addressed several maintenance issues;
4) Switched to Google's Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) after deprecation of GCM

When the user clicks Forgot Password? and enters a Phone Number a temporary password is sent to that number via SMS.  If the user incorrectly enters the temporary password three times they will be sent a new temporary password to their Phone Number vs. email as in previous versions.

When the user clicks Forgot Password? and enters a Phone Number a temporary password is sent to that number via SMS.  If the user incorrectly enters the temporary password three times they will be sent a new temporary password to their Phone Number vs. email as in previous versions.
Maintenance update to address several customer issues.

- New Caregiver Chat functionality that allows a Caregiver to communicate via an intuitive chat interface with Agency personnel.
- Care Insights for Payers, if configured, will prompt the Caregiver for questions as part of the post Clock Out housekeeping tasks.
